name: uCruiser.com
tag_list: cruise-reviews, cruise-forums, cruise-photos, cruise-videos, cruise-blogs, cruise-countdown-clocks, cruise-ticker, cruise-ships-cruise-lines
description: Cruise ship reviews and cruise community
overview:
uCruiser.com is a community for cruise travelers to share their cruise memories and experiences.

The founder of uCruiser.com is not affiliated with any cruise line, travel agency or any other part of the cruise industry, and the website was created solely for the purpose of bringing cruise vacationers together in an all-in-one website community environment.

The members of uCruiser.com can create cruise clubs with private forums to stay in touch with their cruise mates. They can write about their cruises and tie it together with their uploaded photos and videos for it to be an in depth cruise review. They can also write their own blog, create polls and make countdown cruise clocks and roll calls for upcoming cruises.

Members can connect by adding each other as “friends” as well commenting on each others uploaded content and cruise reviews.

external_links.title: uCruiser.com Launched as the New Cruise Haven Online
